short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust video playback speed with '+' and '-' keys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple extension that adds the option to change panopto videos speed (by 0.25 bumps) each time using the '+' and '-' keys instead of using the mouse.

Pressing '=' will bring it back to x1
